titleStmt.title: The coppy of a certain large act (obligatory) of Tonker Lovis de Bils, Lord of Koppensdamme, Bonen, &c. touching the skill of a better way of anatomy of mans body.
Kopye van zekere ampele acte. English. 1659
titleStmt.author: Bils, Lodewijk de, 1624-1670.

notesStmt.note: Translation of author's Kopye van zekere ampele acte.
